Name: Heatblast
Description: Heatblast is a red fire alien made of living magma from the planet Pyros. He controls fire, shoots flames, and flies using heat jets. Known as the 'red fire alien' or 'magma alien'.
Keywords: red fire alien, magma, lava, pyros, flame alien, fire powers

Name: Four Arms
Description: Four Arms is a large red muscular alien with four arms from Khoros. Known for extreme strength and shockwave punches. Often recognized as the 'strong red alien'.
Keywords: four arms, strong alien, red strong alien, muscular alien

Name: XLR8
Description: XLR8 is a blue velociraptor-like speed alien capable of extreme acceleration. Known as the 'fast blue alien' or 'speedster alien'.
Keywords: fast alien, blue speed alien, speedster, acceleration

Name: Diamondhead
Description: Diamondhead is a green crystalline alien who can generate and shoot crystal shards. Known as the 'crystal alien'.
Keywords: crystal alien, green crystal body, sharp crystals

Name: Grey Matter
Description: Grey Matter is a tiny grey alien with extremely high intelligence. Known as the 'small smart alien'.
Keywords: smart alien, small alien, tiny genius alien

Name: Wildmutt
Description: Wildmutt is a beast-like orange alien without eyes who relies on smell and sound. Known as the 'beast alien' or 'dog-like alien'.
Keywords: dog alien, beast alien, orange creature

Name: Alien X
Description: Alien X is a cosmic being with near-omnipotent power. Known as the 'god alien'.
Keywords: cosmic alien, god alien, reality manipulation

Name: AmpFibian
Description: AmpFibian is a blue jellyfish-like alien who controls electricity. Known as the 'electric jellyfish alien'.
Keywords: electric alien, jellyfish alien, blue electric alien

Name: Big Chill
Description: Big Chill is a ghost-like blue alien who freezes objects and turns intangible. Known as the 'blue ghost alien'.
Keywords: ghost alien, ice alien, blue ghost, freeze powers

Name: Armodrillo
Description: Armodrillo is a yellow armored alien who drills and creates quakes. Known as the 'drill alien'.
Keywords: drill alien, yellow armored alien, seismic powers

Name: Blitzwolfer
Description: Blitzwolfer is a wolf-like alien with a powerful sonic howl. Known as the 'wolf alien'.
Keywords: wolf alien, sonic scream alien, werewolf alien

Name: Buzzshock
Description: Buzzshock is a small yellow alien that shoots electricity. Known as the 'battery alien'.
Keywords: electric alien, yellow alien, battery creature

Name: EyeGuy
Description: EyeGuy is covered in eyes that fire powerful energy beams. Known as the 'eye alien'.
Keywords: eye alien, beam alien, multi-eyed alien

Name: Ghostfreak
Description: Ghostfreak is a ghost-like alien who becomes invisible and intangible. Known as the 'scary ghost alien'.
Keywords: ghost alien, scary alien, intangible alien

Name: Goop
Description: Goop is a green slime alien controlled by an anti-gravity disc. Known as the 'slime alien'.
Keywords: slime alien, green goo alien, shapeshifter

Name: Highbreed
Description: Highbreed are tall white elite aliens with great strength. Known as the 'white elite alien'.
Keywords: white alien, elite alien, strong alien

Name: Humongousaur
Description: Humongousaur is a dinosaur-like alien who grows larger and stronger. Known as the 'giant dino alien'.
Keywords: giant alien, dinosaur alien, big strong alien

Name: Jetray
Description: Jetray is a red-and-yellow winged alien who flies fast and shoots neuroshock blasts. Known as the 'flying red alien'.
Keywords: flying alien, red flying alien, laser alien

Name: Kevin 11
Description: Kevin 11 is a mutant combining multiple alien abilities. Known as the 'combined alien'.
Keywords: mutant alien, hybrid alien, power absorption

Name: NRG
Description: NRG is a radioactive alien sealed in a heavy protective suit. Known as the 'radiation alien'.
Keywords: radiation alien, energy alien, radioactive suit

Name: Ripjaws
Description: Ripjaws is a fish-like alien adapted for underwater combat. Known as the 'aquatic alien'.
Keywords: fish alien, water alien, aquatic creature

Name: Spidermonkey
Description: Spidermonkey is a monkey-spider hybrid alien with agility and webs. Known as the 'spider monkey alien'.
Keywords: monkey alien, spider alien, blue monkey

Name: Stinkfly
Description: Stinkfly is an insect-like alien who flies and spits acid. Known as the 'bug alien'.
Keywords: bug alien, insect alien, flying insect

Name: Swampfire
Description: Swampfire is a plant-based alien with fire control and regeneration. Known as the 'plant fire alien'.
Keywords: plant alien, fire plant, swamp alien

Name: Turtlepin
Description: Turtlepin is a turtle-like alien with strong defensive abilities. Known as the 'turtle alien'.
Keywords: turtle alien, shell alien

Name: Ultimate Humungousaur
Description: Ultimate Humungousaur is an armored evolution of Humungousaur with missile launchers. Known as the 'armored dino alien'.
Keywords: armored alien, missile alien, giant dino

Name: Ultimate Rath
Description: Ultimate Rath is a stronger and more aggressive version of Rath. Known as the 'ultimate tiger alien'.
Keywords: tiger alien, strong alien, aggressive alien

Name: Upgrade
Description: Upgrade merges with and enhances technology. Known as the 'tech alien'.
Keywords: tech alien, machine alien, upgrade alien

Name: Vilgax
Description: Vilgax is a powerful warlord and Ben's main enemy. Known as the 'villain alien'.
Keywords: villain, strong villain, chimera alien

Name: Water Hazard
Description: Water Hazard is a red armored alien who controls high-pressure water. Known as the 'water jet alien'.
Keywords: water alien, red water alien, hydro alien

Name: Way Big
Description: Way Big is a towering cosmic giant with incredible power. Known as the 'giant alien'.
Keywords: giant alien, tall alien, cosmic giant

Name: Wildvine
Description: Wildvine is a plant alien who creates vines and seeds. Known as the 'vine alien'.
Keywords: plant alien, vine alien, green plant alien

Name: Upchuck
Description: Upchuck is a small green alien who eats objects and converts them to energy blasts. Known as the 'eating alien'.
Keywords: eating alien, green alien, gourmand

Name: Echo Echo
Description: Echo Echo is a small white alien who multiplies and uses sonic screams. Known as the 'sound alien'.
Keywords: sound alien, sonic alien, white alien
